Introduction:We tried to make a mind game "RUBIK'S CUBE"  using the concepts that we got to learn from "CS 101" course.
	     We used init canvas graphics library.
	     This is a startergy game for a single player.
	     With the help of mouseclick the game can be played.
	     The game contais all the 6 faces of the cube seperately.
	     The objective of the game is to solve the cube by making same color on each face of the cube.
             you can press refresh button to start the new game.    
 	     



System requirements:This is designed for MAC OS AND Ubuntu (32 or 64 bit) (not tested on windows)



Installation:It runs on codeblocks with included libraries(init canavas library).
	     Get Full Version of Codeblocks from "http://www.cse.iitb.ac.in/~ranade/simplecpp/CB-Simplecpp-setup.exe"



Configaration: init canvas library is inbuilt graphics library in ubuntu and mac os .
               
               for windows version  download WinBGIm from http://www.mediafire.com/?nd3whqoqb36h8ou and extract it.
               Copy and paste graphics.h and winbgim.h files to include folder of your compiler directory. 
               Copy and paste libbgi.a to lib folder of your compiler directory. 
               In code::blocks open Settings >> Compiler and debugger >>linker settings
               click Add button  in link libraries part and browse and SELECT libbgi.a file
               In right part (ie. other linker options) paste commands
               -lbgi -lgdi32 -lcomdlg32 -luuid -loleaut32 -lole32
               click Ok 

              	   
	      



Compile and Runing program: Open the file located in 'source' with codeblocks.
			    Click 'compile' button or 'Ctrl + f9' to compile the code.
			    Click 'run' button or 'Ctrl+f10' to run the code.
			    Alternatively you can click 'compile & run' or 'f9' to do both at once.
